tool_description: Api translator, with this api you could get translate your text easily from one of the supported languages to another one
title: Translate it

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: with this endpoint you can translate text from one language to another one with the following params: q, source, target (q is the text to translate, source is the language of the text and target is the language to translate the text)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-it1.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-it1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: options
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the supported languages and the possible translations between them
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-it1.p.rapidapi.com/options"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-it1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: with this endpoint you can translate text from one language to another one with the following params: q, source, target (q is the text to translate, source is the language of the text and target is the language to translate the text)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-it1.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-it1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
